name: The Map
mission: Extract hawkish/dovish tone, forward pressure, rate path, and macro wind direction.
drivers: Severely low oil price ($60.15) directly impacting Saudi government revenue and key sector earnings.
Extreme global risk-off sentiment, evidenced by a sky-high gold price, suggesting a flight from equities.
High US 10Y Yield (4.14%) tightening global liquidity and increasing the appeal of bonds over stocks.
ai_analysis: The Saudi market faces severe headwinds from the collapse in oil prices, which is its primary economic engine. This is compounded by an extreme global risk-off environment, which will likely lead to capital outflows from emerging markets like Saudi Arabia, overriding any positive sentiment from US equity strength.
